TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Panital, title = Panital, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Panital} }

S.FORM: Panital Itiniay i Zhuoxi Cen no Hualien ko Panital a niyaro', 127 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 427 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 95% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 406 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 5% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 21 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bunun 86%, Amis 4%, Paiwan 1%, Truku 1%, Seediq 1%, roma 1%.

Panital Itiniay i Zhooxi Cen no Hoalien ko Panital a niyaro', 127 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 427 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 95% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 406 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 5% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 21 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bonon 86%, Amis 4%, Paiwan 1%, Troko 1%, Seediq 1%, roma 1%.
